funcs.name: RegisterListener

funcs.description: Add a quest to the quest log

funcs.description: Add an item to the shop whitelist.

funcs.name: CreateLocationTask
funcs.description: Add a task to move to a specific location

funcs.name: EnableCreepAggroViz
funcs.description: Alert the player when a creep becomes agro to their hero.

funcs.name: EnablePlayerOffscreenTip
funcs.description: Enable the tip to alert players how to find their hero.

funcs.name: EnableTowerAggroViz
funcs.description: Alert the player when a tower becomes agro to their hero.

funcs.description: Force the start of the game.

funcs.name: IsItemInWhiteList
funcs.description: Is this item currently in the white list.

funcs.name: RemoveShopWhitelistItem
funcs.description: Remove an item from the shop whitelist.

funcs.name: SelectHero
funcs.description: Select a hero for the local player

funcs.name: SelectPlayerTeam
funcs.description: Select the team for the local player

funcs.name: SetOrModifyPlayerGold
funcs.description: Set gold amount for the tutorial player. (int) GoldAmount, (bool) true=Set, false=Modify

funcs.name: SetShopOpen
funcs.description: Set the shop open or closed.

funcs.name: SetTimeFrozen
funcs.description: Set if we should freeze time or not.

funcs.name: SetTutorialUI
funcs.description: Set the UI to use a reduced version to focus attention to specific elements.

funcs.name: SetWhiteListEnabled
funcs.description: Set if we should whitelist shop items.

funcs.name: UpgradePlayerAbility
funcs.description: Upgrade a specific ability for the local hero

funcs.description: Get the current custom team assignment for this player.

funcs.description: Includes spectators and players not assigned to a team

funcs.description: Get the 64 bit steam ID for a given player.

funcs.name: GetTeamPlayerCount
funcs.description: Players on a valid team (radiant, dire, or custom*) who haven't abandoned the game

funcs.name: HasCustomGameTicketForPlayerID
funcs.description: Does this player have a custom game ticket for this game?

funcs.name: ReplaceHeroWith
funcs.description: (playerID, heroClassName, gold, XP) - replaces the player's hero with a new one of the specified class, gold and XP

funcs.name: SetCameraTarget
funcs.description: (playerID, entity) - force the given player's camera to follow the given entity

funcs.name: SetCustomBuybackCooldown
funcs.description: Set the buyback cooldown for this player.

funcs.name: SetCustomBuybackCost
funcs.description: Set the buyback cost for this player.

funcs.name: SetCustomPlayerColor
funcs.description: Set custom color for player (minimap, scoreboard, etc)

funcs.name: SetCustomTeamAssignment
funcs.description: Set custom team assignment for this player.

funcs.name: SetOverrideSelectionEntity
funcs.description: Set the forced selection entity for a player.

PlayerResource.name: PlayerResource

funcs.name: FindAllByClassname
funcs.description: Finds all entities by class name. Returns an array containing all the found entities.

funcs.name: FindAllByClassnameWithin
funcs.description: Find entities by class name within a radius.

funcs.name: FindAllByName
funcs.description: Find all entities by name. Returns an array containing all the found entities in it.

funcs.name: FindAllByNameWithin
funcs.description: Find entities by name within a radius.

funcs.name: FindByClassname
funcs.description: Find entities by class name. Pass 'null' to start an iteration, or reference to a previously found entity to continue a search

funcs.name: FindByClassnameNearest
funcs.description: Find entities by class name nearest to a point.

funcs.name: FindByClassnameWithin
funcs.description: Find entities by class name within a radius. Pass 'null' to start an iteration, or reference to a previously found entity to continue a search

funcs.name: FindByModel
funcs.description: Find entities by model name. Pass 'null' to start an iteration, or reference to a previously found entity to continue a search

funcs.name: FindByModelWithin
funcs.description: Find entities by model name within a radius. Pass 'null' to start an iteration, or reference to a previously found entity to continue a search

funcs.name: FindByName
funcs.description: Find entities by name. Pass 'null' to start an iteration, or reference to a previously found entity to continue a search

funcs.name: FindByNameNearest
funcs.description: Find entities by name nearest to a point.

funcs.name: FindByNameWithin
funcs.description: Find entities by name within a radius. Pass 'null' to start an iteration, or reference to a previously found entity to continue a search

funcs.name: FindByTarget
funcs.description: Find entities by targetname. Pass 'null' to start an iteration, or reference to a previously found entity to continue a search

funcs.name: FindInSphere
funcs.description: Find entities within a radius. Pass 'null' to start an iteration, or reference to a previously found entity to continue a search

funcs.name: First
funcs.description: Begin an iteration over the list of entities

funcs.name: Next
funcs.description: Continue an iteration over the list of entities, providing reference to a previously found entity

ParticleManager.description: Used to create, modify and remove Particles.

funcs.name: GetBool
funcs.description: GetBool(name) : returns the convar as a boolean flag.

funcs.name: GetCommandClient
funcs.description: GetCommandClient() : returns the player who issued this console command.

funcs.name: GetDOTACommandClient
funcs.description: GetDOTACommandClient() : returns the DOTA player who issued this console command.

funcs.name: GetFloat
funcs.description: GetFloat(name) : returns the convar as a float. May return null if no such convar.

funcs.name: GetInt
funcs.description: GetInt(name) : returns the convar as an int. May return null if no such convar.

funcs.name: GetStr
funcs.description: GetStr(name) : returns the convar as a string. May return null if no such convar.

funcs.name: RegisterCommand
funcs.description: RegisterCommand(name, fn, helpString, flags) : register a console command.

funcs.name: RegisterConvar
funcs.description: RegisterConvar(name, defaultValue, helpString, flags): register a new console variable.

funcs.name: SetBool
funcs.description: SetBool(name, val) : sets the value of the convar to the bool.

funcs.name: SetFloat
funcs.description: SetFloat(name, val) : sets the value of the convar to the float.

funcs.name: SetInt
funcs.description: SetInt(name, val) : sets the value of the convar to the int.

funcs.name: SetStr
funcs.description: SetStr(name, val) : sets the value of the convar to the string.

ConVars.name: ConVars
ConVars.description: ConVars store information on the client and server that can be accessed using the developer console. ConVar is short for "console variable". Sometimes it is also spelled like "CVar".

funcs.name: Length2D
funcs.description: Length of the Vector in the XY plane
